QuestData.Title: Replenishing the Healing Crystals
QuestData.Description: We are the draenei. Our ship crashed and, since we have many wounded, our immediate concern is the depleted state of our healing crystals. We must replenish them quickly!$B$BUnfortunately, the only way to do this at this point is to extract the blood from the local vale moths. Their blood will make for a suitable substitute.$B$BThe moths can be found in many places around the vale, but mostly in the northwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire 6 Vials of Moth Blood from the nearby Vale Moths and bring them to Proenitus at the Crash Site in Ammen Vale.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you harvested the necessary moth blood for the healing crystals yet? With survivors scattered all over the vale, time is of the essence!
QuestData.RewardText: Regrettable that those creatures had to die so that we might live - indiscriminate killing is not the draenei way. However, the blood you gathered will replenish our healing crystals, so their deaths will not be in vain.
